Articles.Content:
I know there's a lot of Kerbal Space Program lets plays out there, but I try to add a bit of humour to mine.

Check it out and see if you like it. If you do like it, I'd recommend subscribing because I plan to get out at least one episode per day.

Trust me, the ending is quite hilarious, so skip to 10 minutes if you're skeptical

Edited August 11, 2012 by sal_vager

Hahaha, that last bit is quite funny, my face lit up at the Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy theme tune (AKA The Eagles - Journey of the Sorcerer).

PS: The brake key is B.
My god, that's going to be so helpful. Thanks

New video up, part 2 of my series.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HxuUdo7fw6Y&feature=plcp

Please like and subscribe, and don't be deterred by the fact that there's only two episodes! I started this yesterday.
